A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie removed the mystique of Star Wars... For decades\, Star Wars has been about a legendary\, mystical order which protected the galaxy through a blood line\, members of whom were trained and taught in the ancient ways of the force. Now everybody has the force\, they don't need training from a wise master\, and they don't need the history or teachings of the Jedi order. The film was visually appealing to the eyes\, but a stain on the saga's legacy. I'd rather watch Episode 1 on repeat for the rest of my life than watch this film again.
